data.name: 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》 Demo
data.detailed_description:
《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》Demo


A third-person shooter action game. Each encounter in the game challenges the player to develop a situational awareness in 3D space, which includes constantly prioritizing your target whilst observing the surroundings to find out the key to advance to the next stage.

Demo Content


  • Tutorial Level
  • Puzzle Level

data.short_description: A third-person shooter action game. Each encounter in the game challenges the player to develop a situational awareness in 3D space, which includes constantly prioritizing your target whilst observing the surroundings to find out the key to advance to the next stage.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Russian, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 680
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Digital Output
  • Additional Notes: DX11 REQUIRED FOR NVIDIA HAIRWORKS TO RUN PROPERLY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: DX11 REQUIRED FOR NVIDIA HAIRWORKS TO RUN PROPERLY
